Do you understand that sending people to prison camps without due process is a dictator move, and then support Trump anyway?  But of course the law matters. Compassion also matters. Every other president, of either party, has deported people but they generally managed to do it *with due process* and *without the sort of cruelty that Trump and the magas celebrate.*  When Trump uses words like "vermin" and "animals" and "they're poisoning our blood," he's echoing some of the vilest dehumanizing rhetoric in history.
